name: Crafting And Guide for Minecraft
description:
A Minecraft guide, containing a guide for crafting, mobs and also a quiz. This app will help you with the most basic crafting recipes as well as the most complicated and unique

Features:

-Crafting guide, a guide for all of the different blocks and crafting.
-Mobs guide, a complete guide for all the mobs in Minecraft.
-Quiz, a quiz to test your knowledge about Minecraft.

Disclaimer:
This is an unofficial guide to Minecraft, note that this app is not associated in any way to the Minecraft trademark.
